title: UnitedHealth: A Gamechanger Eases The Pain (NYSE:UNH)
description: Major investors show confidence in UNH despite weak Q2 earnings.
content:
The Pioneer Of Seeking Alpha's BAD BEAT Investing, Quad 7 Capital is a team of 7 analysts with a wide range of experience sharing investment opportunities for nearly 12 years. They are best known for their February 2020 call to sell everything & go short, & have been on average 95% long 5% short since May 2020. The broader company has expertise in business, policy, economics, mathematics, game theory, & the sciences. They share both long & short trades & invest personally in equities they discuss within their investing group BAD BEAT Investing, focused on short- & medium-term investments, income generation, special-situations, & momentum trades. Rather than just give you trades, they focus on teaching investors to become proficient traders through their playbook. Their goal is to save you time by providing in depth, high-quality research, with crystal clear entry and exit targets. They have a proven track record of success.

Benefits of BAD BEAT Investing include: Learning how to understand the pinball nature of markets, executing well-researched written trade ideas each week, use of 4 chat rooms, receive daily complimentary key analyst upgrade/downgrade summaries, learning basic options trading, & extensive trading tools. If you would like to learn more, click the link above!

keywords.name: daily complimentary key analyst upgrade/downgrade summaries

summary: The Pioneer of Seeking Alpha's BAD BEAT Investing, Quad 7 Capital, is a team of 7 analysts with extensive knowledge of business, policy, economics, mathematics, and the sciences. They focus on teaching investors how to become proficient traders rather than just play a role in the market. The company has been on average 95% long 5% short since May 2020. The benefits of their approach include providing high-quality research and providing clear entry and exit targets.
shortSummary: QuQuarney's BAD BEAT Investing, led by seven analysts, provides comprehensive, deep-rooted research on short-term trading strategies, offering comprehensive insider knowledge and expert advice.
argos_summary: Quad 7 Capital, operating under the BAD BEAT Investing brand, is a seven‑analyst team that has been sharing investment ideas for nearly 12 years, known for a high‑profile February 2020 short call and a recent 95% long, 5% short portfolio. The group offers a mix of long and short trades, personal equity investments, and a focus on short‑ and medium‑term opportunities, income generation, special situations, and momentum trades. BAD BEAT Investing emphasizes teaching traders through a playbook, providing detailed research, clear entry and exit targets, and tools such as chat rooms, daily analyst summaries, and basic options education. Their goal is to save time for investors by delivering high‑quality, actionable research and a comprehensive trading toolkit.
